text.p: Jessica Yamada does not have HP and is not a target
Jessica Yamada counts as incapacitated when determining whether the heroes have lost

power.name: Therapy
power.text: 1 hero other than Jessica Yamada either regains 2 HP or draws a card

text.p: A hero other than Jessica Yamada may search their deck for a card, put it into their hand, and then shuffle their deck
A hero other than Jessica Yamada may play a card and use a power, in any order
At the end of your turn, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a One-Shot, you may put it into your hand. Otherwise, return it to the top of the deck
Whenever a hero plays no cards during their play phase, they may draw a card
Whenever a hero uses no powers during their power phase, they may draw a card
Whenever a hero skips a phase, they may draw a card
You may discard any number of cards. A hero other than Jessica Yamada draws X cards, where X is the number of cards you just discarded + 2
At the start of your turn, a hero regains 3 HP
Whenever a hero would deal themselves damage, you may prevent that damage
Each hero reveals the top card of their deck. They may either discard it or return it to the top of the deck
Each hero may search their trash for a card and put it into their hand
Reduce psychic damage dealt to hero targets by 1

A hero other than Jessica Yamada reveals cards from the top of their deck until they reveal an Ongoing. They may either put it into play or into their hand. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into their deck
